00099 template<typename TreeT>
00100 struct PointDataAccessor {
00101     typedef typename TreeT::ValueType       ValueType;
00102     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType    LeafNode;
00103     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueType PointIndexT;
00104     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueTypePair PointDataIndex;
00105 
00106     explicit PointDataAccessor(const TreeT& tree)
00107         : mTree(&tree)
00108         , mAccessor(tree) { }
00109 
00112 
00113     PointDataIndex get(const Coord& ijk) const;
00114 
00117     Index64 pointCount(const Coord& ijk) const;
00118 
00124     Index64 totalPointCount(const point_masks::PointCountMask mask = point_masks::Active) const;
00125 
00126     tree::ValueAccessor<const TreeT>& valueAccessor() const { return mAccessor; }
00127 
00129 
00131     const TreeT& tree() const { assert(mTree); return *mTree; }
00132 
00133 private:
00134     typedef tree::ValueAccessor<const TreeT>  ConstAccessor;
00135     const TreeT* mTree;
00136     mutable ConstAccessor mAccessor;
00137 }; // struct PointDataAccessor
00138 
00139 // PointDataAccessor implementation
00140 
00141 template<typename TreeT>
00142 inline typename PointDataAccessor<TreeT>::PointDataIndex
00143 PointDataAccessor<TreeT>::get(const Coord& ijk) const
00144 {
00145     typedef typename TreeT::LeafNodeType::ValueType PointIndexT;
00146 
00147     const LeafNode* leaf = mAccessor.probeConstLeaf(ijk);
00148 
00149     // leaf not active - no particles
00150 
00151     if (!leaf) return std::make_pair(0, 0);
00152 
00153     const unsigned index = LeafNode::coordToOffset(ijk);
00154 
00155     return leaf->pointIndex(index);
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00159 template<typename TreeT>
00160 inline Index64
00161 PointDataAccessor<TreeT>::pointCount(const Coord& ijk) const
00162 {
00163     PointDataIndex index = get(ijk);
00164 
00165     return index.second - index.first;
00166 }
00167 
00168 template<typename TreeT>
00169 inline Index64
00170 PointDataAccessor<TreeT>::totalPointCount(const point_masks::PointCountMask mask) const
00171 {
00172     typedef typename TreeT::LeafCIter LeafCIter;
00173 
00174     Index64 count = 0;
00175 
00176     for (LeafCIter iter = mTree->cbeginLeaf(); iter; ++iter) {
00177         const LeafNode* leaf = iter.getLeaf();
00178 
00179         Index64 size = leaf->pointCount(mask);
00180 
00181         count += size;
00182     }
00183 
00184     return count;
00185 }

00196     typedef std::unique_ptr<T>  type;

00198     typedef std::auto_ptr<T>    type;
00199 #endif
00200 };

00204 template <typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00205 class PointDataLeafNode : public tree::LeafNode<T, Log2Dim> {
00206 
00207 public:
00208     typedef PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>           LeafNodeType;
00209     typedef boost::shared_ptr<PointDataLeafNode>    Ptr;
00210 
00211     typedef T                                       ValueType;
00212     typedef std::pair<ValueType, ValueType>         ValueTypePair;
00213     typedef std::vector<ValueType>                  IndexArray;
00214 
00215     typedef AttributeSet::Descriptor                Descriptor;
00216 
00218 
00219     // The following methods had to be copied from the LeafNode class
00220     // to make the derived PointDataLeafNode class compatible with the tree structure.
00221 
00222     typedef tree::LeafNode<T, Log2Dim>    BaseLeaf;
00223     typedef util::NodeMask<Log2Dim> NodeMaskType;
00224 
00225     using BaseLeaf::LOG2DIM;
00226     using BaseLeaf::TOTAL;
00227     using BaseLeaf::DIM;
00228     using BaseLeaf::NUM_VALUES;
00229     using BaseLeaf::NUM_VOXELS;
00230     using BaseLeaf::SIZE;
00231     using BaseLeaf::LEVEL;
00232 
00234     PointDataLeafNode()
00235         : BaseLeaf()
00236         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00237 
00238     ~PointDataLeafNode() { }
00239 
00241     explicit PointDataLeafNode(const PointDataLeafNode& other)
00242         : BaseLeaf(other)
00243         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet(*other.mAttributeSet)) { }
00244 
00246     explicit
00247     PointDataLeafNode(const Coord& coords, const T& value = zeroVal<T>(), bool active = false)
00248         : BaseLeaf(coords, value, active)
00249         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00250 
00253     PointDataLeafNode(const PointDataLeafNode& other, const Coord& coords, const T& value = zeroVal<T>(), bool active = false)
00254         : BaseLeaf(coords, value, active)
00255         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet(*other.mAttributeSet)) { }
00256 
00257     // Copy-construct from a PointIndexLeafNode with the same configuration but a different ValueType.
00258     template<typename OtherValueType>
00259     PointDataLeafNode(const tools::PointIndexLeafNode<OtherValueType, Log2Dim>& other)
00260         : BaseLeaf(other)
00261         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00262 
00263     // Copy-construct from a LeafNode with the same configuration but a different ValueType.
00264     // Used for topology copies - explicitly sets the value (background) to zeroVal
00265     template <typename ValueType>
00266     PointDataLeafNode(const tree::LeafNode<ValueType, Log2Dim>& other, const T& value, TopologyCopy)
00267         : BaseLeaf(other, zeroVal<T>(), TopologyCopy())
00268         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }
00269 
00270 #ifndef OPENVDB_2_ABI_COMPATIBLE

00272         const T& value = zeroVal<T>(), bool active = false)
00273         : BaseLeaf(PartialCreate(), coords, value, active)
00274         , mAttributeSet(new AttributeSet) { }

00279     const AttributeSet& attributeSet() const
00280     {
00281         return *mAttributeSet;
00282     }
00283 
00286     void initializeAttributes(const Descriptor::Ptr& descriptor, const size_t arrayLength)
00287     {
00288         mAttributeSet.reset(new AttributeSet(descriptor, arrayLength));
00289     }
00290 
00292     void clearAttributes()
00293     {
00294         mAttributeSet.reset(new AttributeSet(mAttributeSet->descriptorPtr(), 0));
00295 
00296         for (Index n = 0; n < LeafNodeType::NUM_VALUES; n++) {
00297             this->setOffsetOn(n, 0);
00298         }
00299     }

00304     template <typename TypedAttributeArrayType>
00305     bool hasAttribute(const size_t pos) const
00306     {
00307         if (pos >= mAttributeSet->size())     return false;
00308 
00309         const AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->getConst(pos);
00310 
00311         return array->isType<TypedAttributeArrayType>();
00312     }
00313 
00316     template <typename TypedAttributeArrayType>
00317     bool hasAttribute(const Name& attributeName) const
00318     {
00319         const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);
00320 
00321         if (pos == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS)   return false;
00322 
00323         return hasAttribute<TypedAttributeArrayType>(pos);
00324     }
00325 
00326     template <typename AttributeType>
00327     AttributeWriteHandle<AttributeType>* attributeWriteHandle(const size_t pos)
00328     {
00329         if (pos >= mAttributeSet->size())             OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Out Of Range");
00330 
00331         AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->get(pos);
00332 
00333         return new AttributeWriteHandle<AttributeType>(*array);
00334     }
00335 
00336     template <typename AttributeType>
00337     AttributeWriteHandle<AttributeType>* attributeWriteHandle(const Name& attributeName)
00338     {
00339         const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);
00340 
00341         if (pos == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS)         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Not Found");
00342 
00343         AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->get(pos);
00344 
00345         return new AttributeWriteHandle<AttributeType>(*array);
00346     }

00370     template <typename TypedAttributeType>
00371     TypedAttributeType& typedAttributeArray(const size_t pos)
00372     {
00373         if (pos >= mAttributeSet->size())             OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Out Of Range");
00374 
00375         AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->get(pos);
00376 
00377         if (!array->isType<TypedAttributeType>())     OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Invalid Attribute Type");
00378 
00379         return static_cast<TypedAttributeType& >(*array);
00380     }
00381

00391         if (!array->isType<TypedAttributeType>())     OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Invalid Attribute Type");

00399         if (pos >= mAttributeSet->size())             OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Out Of Range");
00400

00408     template <typename TypedAttributeType>
00409     const TypedAttributeType& typedAttributeArray(const Name& attributeName) const
00410     {
00411         const size_t pos = mAttributeSet->find(attributeName);
00412 
00413         if (pos == AttributeSet::INVALID_POS)         OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Attribute Not Found");
00414 
00415         const AttributeArray* array = mAttributeSet->getConst(pos);
00416 
00417         if (!array->isType<TypedAttributeType>())     OPENVDB_THROW(LookupError, "Invalid Attribute Type");
00418 
00419         return static_cast<const TypedAttributeType& >(*array);
00420     }
00421 
00422     ValueTypePair pointIndex(const unsigned index) const
00423     {
00424         assert(index < BaseLeaf::SIZE);
00425 
00426         const ValueType end = this->getValue(index);
00427 
00428         const ValueType start = (index == 0) ? ValueType(0) : this->getValue(index - 1);
00429 
00430         return std::make_pair(start, end);
00431     }
00432 
00433     Index64 pointCount(const unsigned n) const
00434     {
00435         ValueTypePair index = this->pointIndex(n);
00436 
00437         return index.second - index.first;
00438     }
00439 
00440     Index64 pointCount(const point_masks::PointCountMask mask = point_masks::Active) const
00441     {
00442         const util::NodeMask<Log2Dim>& valueMask = this->getValueMask();
00443 
00444         // return the number of points in every voxel if the mask matches the ValueMask
00445         // or mask == All
00446         if ((mask == point_masks::All)                              ||
00447             (mask == point_masks::Active && valueMask.isOn())       ||
00448             (mask == point_masks::Inactive && valueMask.isOff()))   return this->getValue(NUM_VOXELS - 1);
00449 
00450         // if the leaf is off and we are querying active points, or
00451         // if the leaf is on and we are querying inactive points, return 0
00452         if ((mask == point_masks::Active && valueMask.isOff())          ||
00453             (mask == point_masks::Inactive && valueMask.isOn()))    return 0;
00454 
00455         // otherwise portions of the leaf are inactive/active. loop to find these
00456         // depending on the mask
00457         Index64 totalPointCount = 0;
00458 
00459         const bool active = mask == point_masks::Active;
00460         const bool inactive = mask == point_masks::Inactive;
00461 
00462         for (unsigned i = 0; i < NUM_VOXELS; i++)
00463         {
00464             bool valueOn = this->isValueOn(i);
00465             if((valueOn && active) || (!valueOn && inactive))
00466             {
00467                 ValueTypePair index = this->pointIndex(i);
00468                 totalPointCount += (index.second - index.first);
00469             }
00470         }
00471 
00472         return totalPointCount;
00473     }
00474 
00475     void deactivateEmptyVoxels()
00476     {
00477         for (Index n = 0; n < LeafNodeType::NUM_VALUES; n++) {
00478             if (this->pointCount(n) > 0)         continue;
00479 
00480             this->setValueMaskOff(n);
00481         }
00482     }
00483 
00485 
00486     void setOffsetOn(Index offset, const ValueType& val)
00487     {
00488         this->buffer().setValue(offset, val);
00489         this->setValueMaskOn(offset);
00490     }
00491 
00492     void setOffsetOnly(Index offset, const ValueType& val)
00493     {
00494         this->buffer().setValue(offset, val);
00495     }

00507     bool operator==(const PointDataLeafNode& other) const {
00508         if(BaseLeaf::operator==(other) != true) return false;
00509         return (*this->mAttributeSet == *other.mAttributeSet);
00510     }

00525     NodeT* probeNodeAndCache(const Coord&, AccessorT&)
00526     {

00663         MaskOnIterator, PointDataLeafNode, const ValueType, ValueOn> ValueOnIter;

00665         MaskOnIterator, const PointDataLeafNode, const ValueType, ValueOn> ValueOnCIter;
00666     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ValueIter<
00667         MaskOffIterator, PointDataLeafNode, const ValueType, ValueOff> ValueOffIter;
00668     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ValueIter<
00669         MaskOffIterator,const PointDataLeafNode,const ValueType,ValueOff> ValueOffCIter;
00670     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ValueIter<
00671         MaskDenseIterator, PointDataLeafNode, const ValueType, ValueAll> ValueAllIter;
00672     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ValueIter<
00673         MaskDenseIterator,const PointDataLeafNode,const ValueType,ValueAll> ValueAllCIter;
00674     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ChildIter<
00675         MaskOnIterator, PointDataLeafNode, ChildOn> ChildOnIter;
00676     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ChildIter<
00677         MaskOnIterator, const PointDataLeafNode, ChildOn> ChildOnCIter;
00678     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ChildIter<
00679         MaskOffIterator, PointDataLeafNode, ChildOff> ChildOffIter;
00680     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template ChildIter<
00681         MaskOffIterator, const PointDataLeafNode, ChildOff> ChildOffCIter;
00682     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template DenseIter<
00683         PointDataLeafNode, ValueType, ChildAll> ChildAllIter;
00684     typedef typename BaseLeaf::template DenseIter<
00685         const PointDataLeafNode, const ValueType, ChildAll> ChildAllCIter;
00686 
00687 #define VMASK_ this->getValueMask()
00688     ValueOnCIter  cbeginValueOn() const  { return ValueOnCIter(VMASK_.beginOn(), this); }
00689     ValueOnCIter   beginValueOn() const  { return ValueOnCIter(VMASK_.beginOn(), this); }
00690     ValueOnIter    beginValueOn()        { return ValueOnIter(VMASK_.beginOn(), this); }
00691     ValueOffCIter cbeginValueOff() const { return ValueOffCIter(VMASK_.beginOff(), this); }
00692     ValueOffCIter  beginValueOff() const { return ValueOffCIter(VMASK_.beginOff(), this); }
00693     ValueOffIter   beginValueOff()       { return ValueOffIter(VMASK_.beginOff(), this); }
00694     ValueAllCIter cbeginValueAll() const { return ValueAllCIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00695     ValueAllCIter  beginValueAll() const { return ValueAllCIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00696     ValueAllIter   beginValueAll()       { return ValueAllIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00697 
00698     ValueOnCIter  cendValueOn() const    { return ValueOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00699     ValueOnCIter   endValueOn() const    { return ValueOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00700     ValueOnIter    endValueOn()          { return ValueOnIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00701     ValueOffCIter cendValueOff() const   { return ValueOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00702     ValueOffCIter  endValueOff() const   { return ValueOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00703     ValueOffIter   endValueOff()         { return ValueOffIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00704     ValueAllCIter cendValueAll() const   { return ValueAllCIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00705     ValueAllCIter  endValueAll() const   { return ValueAllCIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00706     ValueAllIter   endValueAll()         { return ValueAllIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00707 
00708     ChildOnCIter  cbeginChildOn() const  { return ChildOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00709     ChildOnCIter   beginChildOn() const  { return ChildOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00710     ChildOnIter    beginChildOn()        { return ChildOnIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00711     ChildOffCIter cbeginChildOff() const { return ChildOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00712     ChildOffCIter  beginChildOff() const { return ChildOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00713     ChildOffIter   beginChildOff()       { return ChildOffIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00714     ChildAllCIter cbeginChildAll() const { return ChildAllCIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00715     ChildAllCIter  beginChildAll() const { return ChildAllCIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00716     ChildAllIter   beginChildAll()       { return ChildAllIter(VMASK_.beginDense(), this); }
00717 
00718     ChildOnCIter  cendChildOn() const    { return ChildOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00719     ChildOnCIter   endChildOn() const    { return ChildOnCIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00720     ChildOnIter    endChildOn()          { return ChildOnIter(VMASK_.endOn(), this); }
00721     ChildOffCIter cendChildOff() const   { return ChildOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00722     ChildOffCIter  endChildOff() const   { return ChildOffCIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00723     ChildOffIter   endChildOff()         { return ChildOffIter(VMASK_.endOff(), this); }
00724     ChildAllCIter cendChildAll() const   { return ChildAllCIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00725     ChildAllCIter  endChildAll() const   { return ChildAllCIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00726     ChildAllIter   endChildAll()         { return ChildAllIter(VMASK_.endDense(), this); }
00727 #undef VMASK_
00728 }; // struct PointDataLeafNode
00729 
00730 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00731 inline void
00732 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::readTopology(std::istream& is, bool fromHalf)
00733 {
00734     BaseLeaf::readTopology(is, fromHalf);
00735 }
00736 
00737 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00738 inline void
00739 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::writeTopology(std::ostream& os, bool toHalf) const
00740 {
00741     BaseLeaf::writeTopology(os, toHalf);
00742 }
00743 
00744 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00745 inline void
00746 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::readBuffers(std::istream& is, bool fromHalf)
00747 {
00748     BaseLeaf::readBuffers(is, fromHalf);
00749 
00750     mAttributeSet->read(is);
00751 }
00752 
00753 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00754 inline void
00755 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::readBuffers(std::istream& is, const CoordBBox& bbox, bool fromHalf)
00756 {
00757     // Read and clip voxel values (no clipping yet).
00758     BaseLeaf::readBuffers(is, bbox, fromHalf);
00759 
00760     mAttributeSet->read(is);
00761 }
00762 
00763 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00764 inline void
00765 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::writeBuffers(std::ostream& os, bool toHalf) const
00766 {
00767     BaseLeaf::writeBuffers(os, toHalf);
00768 
00769     mAttributeSet->write(os);
00770 }
00771 
00772 template<typename T, Index Log2Dim>
00773 inline Index64
00774 PointDataLeafNode<T, Log2Dim>::memUsage() const
00775 {
00776     return BaseLeaf::memUsage() + mAttributeSet->memUsage();
00777 }
